import React from "react"; import "./CardProduct.css"; import { incCart, decCart, removeCart } from "../../../src/context/cartSlice"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { FaRegTrashAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; function CardProduct({ data }) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
{data?.map((el) => (

{el.title}

Kategoriya: {el.category}

{el.price?.brm()} so'm

{(el.price * el.quantity)?.brm()} so'm

))}

Ma'lumotlarni to'ldiring:

Umumiy narx:

{(el.price * el.quantity + el.price * el.quantity)?.brm()}{" "} so'm
); } export default CardProduct;
